name: Animal Survival VR
description:
Equipment required: Oculus Rift and Oculus controllers

Story

You are fox living within the confines of a city. With you home lost and food scarce, you are unsure of the future of your kind. You are forced to wander in the city and risk human contact to find a mate. But you are not the only fox.

Controls

To move, the player must do a crawling gesture with the Oculus controllers in hand. To change the sense of direction, the player must use the joystick in the right controller.

The game ends when the player finds the female fox.
